title: Define variables

title: Setting an equation
text: Based on the question if $$x$$ is the first number then $$2x+10$$ would be the second number. Now create an equation representing the sum of the two numbers which equals $$1$$

title: Seperating constants
text: The equation equals $$x+2x+10=1$$. Now we will seperate the constant numbers to one side. Remeber if you subtract from one side you are also subtracting from the other side

title: Find $$x$$
text: Now that we have seperated $$x$$ and constants your equations should be $$3x=-9$$. Now find what is the value of $$x$$ by dividing both sides by $$3$$

title: Number $$2$$
